item.description:
@trekonomics Hey, Jesus suffered horrible violence, who are we to ask our rulers for less?

@trekonomics We are ruled by pre-Vatican II Catholics, loudly unapologetic for 1500 years of torture and genocide.

item.description: @NickTagliaferro I mean “even” a helicopter pilot has got to have military secrets. And then she worked for Command. So yes, fun times.

item.description: Word to the wise: Get your YU jokes in now, before President DeSantis stands up for kavod haTorah. https://t.co/gRgBOdllm6

item.description: @typolad How could not add a referral link to your therapist after a post like that?
item.source:markdown: @typolad How could not add a referral link to your therapist after a post like that?

item.description:
Hmmm. I suspect a lot of folks in the Army had access to classified materials — and strong training in their proper handling. Interesting that there are lots of ex-military Democrats holding seats in purple congressional districts. https://t.co/qupSLAfKEH

Take Mikie Sherill, in NJ’s 11th. I know nothing about her beyond what I just read on Wikipedia. But I would guess her military roles outlined there involved classified data.

Her Republican opponent is a lawyer and ex-prosecutor. What is his position on mishandling classified information? Seems like a useful wedge issue for a Democrat in that race.
item.source:markdown:
Hmmm. I suspect a lot of folks in the Army had access to classified materials — and strong training in their proper handling. Interesting that there are lots of ex-military Democrats holding seats in purple congressional districts. https://t.co/qupSLAfKEH
Take Mikie Sherill, in NJ’s 11th. I know nothing about her beyond what I just read on Wikipedia. But I would guess her military roles outlined there involved classified data.
Her Republican opponent is a lawyer and ex-prosecutor. What is his position on mishandling classified information? Seems like a useful wedge issue for a Democrat in that race.

item.description: @DavidAstinWalsh It is totally possible that TFG received information to that effect in a classified PDB and had no idea that that bit of info was public knowledge.
item.source:markdown: @DavidAstinWalsh It is totally possible that TFG received information to that effect in a classified PDB and had no idea that *that* bit of info was public knowledge.

item.description:
I confess: I did not have “Lakewood cuts down trees in act of sodomy” on my 2022 chilul Hashem bingo card. https://t.co/9V0lIrqbJa

Now, I don’t know how much direct influence the Lakewood yeshiva community has on the town council. But clearly, Jewish values concerning both the poor and trees failed to manifest beyond the walls of the yeshiva — if they are even present there.

Meanwhile, if you want proper Talmudic wisdom on the situation, I again recommend Justice in the City by @IrMiklat https://t.co/VkqWjP2oYX

I am informed from a frum source closer to Lakewood than I am that “This was an internal decision with some input from some local businesses, primarily Hispanic. I haven't heard from anyone yet here that was supportive of this move.”
item.source:markdown:
I confess: I did not have “Lakewood cuts down trees in act of sodomy” on my 2022 chilul Hashem bingo card. https://t.co/9V0lIrqbJa
Now, I don’t know how much direct influence the Lakewood yeshiva community has on the town council. But clearly, Jewish values concerning both the poor and trees failed to manifest beyond the walls of the yeshiva — if they are even present there.
Meanwhile, if you want proper Talmudic wisdom on the situation, I again recommend Justice in the City by @IrMiklat https://t.co/VkqWjP2oYX
I am informed from a frum source closer to Lakewood than I am that “This was an internal decision with some input from some local businesses, primarily Hispanic. I haven't heard from anyone yet here that was supportive of this move.”

item.description: @Ah_Pook_Is_Here @YourVote2022 @TristanSnell Right. It’s not his call whether to indict — but it would be irresponsible at this point for Garland not to give him (and the FBI) a heads-up.
item.source:markdown: @Ah_Pook_Is_Here @YourVote2022 @TristanSnell Right. It’s not his call whether to indict — but it would be irresponsible at this point for Garland not to give him (and the FBI) a heads-up.

item.description:
@WinterlightHome Books! Texts! Poems!

@WinterlightHome So much much of that family focus comes down to people seeing Judaism as kid stuff that only matters for the next generation of kids.

@WinterlightHome It creates synagogues that serve the bar mitzvah, rather than b mitzvahs that serve the synagogue.
@onthemainline @JewYid @BenNiderberg Hmmm. The Koren Koran. Adding to my Purim 2do list....
